# echoverse: downloadR 

echoverse module: Single- and multi-threaded downloading functions.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
if(!"remotes" %in% rownames(installed.packages())){install.packages("remotes")}

remotes::install_github("RajLabMSSM/downloadR")
```
